queryForObjectOrNull
The function returns the value of the first column of the first row of the data source or null.
Syntax
queryForObjectOrNull
(source, [param : paramValue])
Setting
Purpose
source
Select
SQL-based data source
.
param
If the selected data source contains parameters, the System will display them
automatically
.
paramValue
If the data source contains parameters, it is necessary to define their values instead of dummy variables
null
.
Most commonly specified using the functions
attr
,
dict
,
var
.
Note
The function is called by the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Sources" and "Algorithms" tabs.
When calling the function, a modal window opens, select the previously created data source from the presented list and click "Done".
